posts.title: Codechef 01 : Problem Code: AGELIMIT
posts.excerpt: Chef wants to appear in a competitive exam. To take the exam, there are following requirements, Minimum age limit is X and Age should be strictly less than Y

posts.title: Codechef 01 : Problem Code: BURGERS
posts.excerpt: Chef is fond of burgers and decided to make as many burgers as possible. Chef has A patties and B buns. To make 1 burger, Chef needs 1 patty and 1 bun. Find the maximum number of burgers that Chef can make.

posts.title: LeetCode 01 : Two Sum
posts.excerpt: Given an array of integers nums and an integer target, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to target.

posts.title: LeetCode 02 : Add Two Numbers
posts.excerpt: You are given two non-empty linked lists representing two non-negative integers. The digits are stored in reverse order, and each of their nodes contains a single digit. Add the two numbers and return the sum as a linked list

posts.title: LeetCode 03 : Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters
posts.excerpt: Given a string s, find the length of the longest substring without repeating characters.
